text: Ace of Base are a Swedish pop-rock group. The beginning of this group was in 1990. There have been changes in the members of Ace of Base many times. They had four studio albums between 1993 and 2002. They have sold 30 million copies of their first four studio albums, making them the third most successful Swedish music group of all time, behind ABBA and Roxette. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== * Happy Nation / The Sign (1993) * The Bridge (1995) * Flowers / Cruel Summer (1998) * Da Capo (2002) * The Golden Ratio (2010) Category:1980s Swedish music groups Category:1990s Swedish music groups Category:2000s Swedish music groups Category:2010s Swedish music groups Category:Musical groups from Gothenburg Category:Musical groups established in 1987 Category:Swedish pop music groups
title: Ace of Base
